page.title: 12Employment
page.content: In the survey block there are a number of factories. One of these is Desborough{Light {Clothing Factory.}This employs 120 people, with about 20 of them in the offices .The factory manufactures overalls,corsets braziers and lingerie. Another factory is{Cheaney's}which employs 200 people.If one gets sacked there is always someone waiting in line for their place. Unlike certain areas in the country, the area covered by the survey block does not really suffer from serious unemployment. School leavers normally manage to find employment in one of the many factories, such as those mentioned above or in{Rigid Containers}which makes cardboard boxes.
